# min

**Type Property**

The minimum representable integer in this type.

## Declaration

```swift
static var min: Int128 { get }
```

## Discussion

For unsigned integer types, this value is always `0`. For signed integer types, this value is `-(2 ** (bitWidth - 1))`, where `**` is exponentiation.
title: min
